about_the_game:
Welcome to Crowpoint Manor, where the guests are "charming," the puzzles are deadly, and the dinners are to die for—literally. As Detective Jad Thorne, you’ve been hired by the eccentric Lord Nigel Foul to go undercover as his footman and investigate the sinister plot brewing among his handpicked guests.

Explore the eerie grandeur of Crowpoint Manor, a sprawling estate filled with rooms that hold more than meets the eye. From a circus performer with a penchant for danger to a botanist with rather aggressive Venus flytraps, each resident poses a new challenge.

Key Features:

  • Pick-up-and-play gameplay: Easy to start, but once you step into Crowpoint Manor, it’ll be hard to leave.

  • Tons of puzzles: Navigate a mansion full of twisted brain teasers and darkly humorous interactions.

  • A thrilling dark comedy: Experience a story dripping with wit, as each accident brings you closer to solving the mystery—or becoming the next victim.

  • Atmosphere you won’t forget: Crowpoint Manor is a place where the absurd meets the eerie, and nothing is quite as it seems.

Will you outwit the guests, uncover the killer, and survive your stay at Crowpoint Manor? Or will your investigation end with dessert?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Chipset 3000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Step inside Crowpoint Manor, where every guest harbours a dark secret. As an undercover detective, you’ll solve bizarre puzzles, navigate dangerous traps, and witness hilariously tragic accidents. Can you uncover the “truth” before you become the next victim?
